pages.title: DenLiner Rekkou
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chance to find $(l:den_o/mobs/kintaros)Kintaros$(/l) inside$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_ax)Rider Ticket Kintaros$(/l)$(li)1-3 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (18%)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (18%)
